      int addDepartment(Department dep)
      add department element into table if the action is do correct,return this record department_id, else return -1

      delete department element from table by id if the action is do correct,return true,else return false
      java.util.ArrayList<Department> getDepartment()
      get all department element from table if the action is do correct,return the list of department, else return null

      update department table element if the action is do correct,return true, else return false
